articles.title: Chance discovery helps fight against malaria - BBC
articles.description: Scientists have found a strain of bacteria which they believe could prevent spread of the disease.
articles.content:
Scientists have found a naturally occurring strain of bacteria which can help stop the transmission of malaria from mosquitoes to humans. 
They found it by chance, after a colony of mosquitoes in on… [+2807 chars]

articles.author: Charlie Haigh
articles.title: What The Cheese Paradox Reveals About Vegetarians' Moral Decision Making - IFLScience
articles.description: There’s a psychological reason ethical vegetarians are still able to eat animal products.
articles.content: While the meat paradox explains how people are able to be both animal lovers and meat eaters, the cheese paradox outlines a complex process of cognitive dissonance that allows those who practice ethi… [+4512 chars]

articles.title: Africa-specific human genetic variation near CHD1L associates with HIV-1 load - Nature.com
articles.description: Africa-specific genetic variation on chromosome 1 near CHD1L is associated with HIV replication in vivo.
